column4: So I have a .ko kernel module that I want to load via insmod. Where should I put this file? Do I need to add its name to a configuration file somewhere?
Is there a better channel to ask questions in?
you could try #linuxhelp or even #linux, the people there are generally terribly helpful  ....  but dont whine if you dont get an instant reply
I don't plan on whining. I am in a hurry though and my question seems fairly simple.
